items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Long Dark Red Dress!
items.body: Gorgeous, stretchy, comfortable, not see through, sexy, yet conservative, long sleeve ankle length dress. I love this dress so much I bought it in 4 colors! Seriously I will buy this in any color that I think I can wear. I’m hoping for an emerald green and chocolate brown, hopefully those colors will be offered at some point. I’m 5’5”, 128, 34D, and it fits like a glove, I bought the medium, because I’m kind of curvy, with thicker thighs, and a booty, so the medium seemed the best choice. This dress looks like was made for me, you will be covered up, but your curves will definitely be highlighted. I’m very happy with the fit of this dress, I’ve worn it with and without shape wear, and, I preferred shape wear, as I’m not a huge fan of VPL. I wore the dark red color to a Christmas Party and the black one on NYE. So much love for this dress, I can’t possibly say enough, just buy this dress. Oh, and I must add that I washed it in the washing machine, in cold water, inside out, and hung it up to dry, and it still looks brand new! Just be careful when putting on jewelry, like a necklace, bracelets, or a watch. I wore the navy color to a wedding, and I was comfortable, stylish, warm at night, but not too hot, it still looked dressy enough for the wedding & reception, and seriously the price is absolutely insane compared to many dresses I had tried on in stores. Curvy Girls: Buy this dress! You will not be disappointed! Your curves will be on display, but in a tasteful way. Read more
items.author: Alyssa Hourglass

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very elegant!
items.body: I ordered this dress for a maternity photo shoot in the same size I would’ve worn if I wasn’t pregnant and was pleasantly surprised how well it worked with my pregnant belly! The ruching makes it so it can stretch with the belly but I imagine it will also give a slimming look when I no longer have my pregnant belly. I’m excited to see what it will look like when I’m not pregnant. The material has good stretch and is not see through at all. My only complaint is you can very easily see sweat if you’re someone who sweats, but that could potentially just be due to the color I chose. Read more
items.author: Madison C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dress!
items.body: This dress is well made and very comfortable. It fits so well and I love the way that I look in it. Read more
items.author: Karen T. Duncan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to wear.
items.body: True to size; size down if between sizes as it is stretchy and very forgiving. Looks good. I recommemd. Read more

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Received used dress
items.body: Just received this dress and wish it had worked out as it was cute. However, there were not tags on the dress and had multiple stains on the front of the dress. Almost like a return was just repackaged and sold again. Probably worn before. Getting a refund. Read more
items.author: D.R

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: LOVE LOVE LOVE IT. Fit accurate with good stretch and comfortable. Loved the color and length. Read more
items.author: Shannon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size & great quality!
items.body: This dress is true to size & the material is great quality. It's similar to a dress that I bought from Macy's 2yrs ago. I received so many compliments on this dress! Read more
items.author: Charisse

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and makes you look beautiful
items.body: Beautiful fit and so soft and comfortable Read more
items.author: Terra

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Ruched Cocktail Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Bodycon Formal Ruched Cocktail Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot, Light Green, Black, Dark Green, Wine Red, Khaki, Champagne Pink, Dark Blue, Light Purple, Rose Pink, Teal, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
